scripts.build-gateway: sudo docker build -f devops/gateway.Dockerfile -t gateway . && sudo docker tag gateway ericerer/gateway && sudo docker push ericerer/gateway
scripts.build-websocket: sudo docker build -f devops/websocket.Dockerfile -t websocket . && sudo docker tag websocket ericerer/websocket && sudo docker push ericerer/websocket
scripts.build-basicgram: sudo docker build -f devops/basicgram.Dockerfile -t basicgram . && sudo docker tag basicgram ericerer/basicgram && sudo docker push ericerer/basicgram
scripts.build-user-server: sudo docker build -f devops/user-server.Dockerfile -t user-server . && sudo docker tag user-server ericerer/user-server && sudo docker push ericerer/user-server
scripts.build-auth-server: sudo docker build -f devops/auth-server.Dockerfile -t auth-server . && sudo docker tag auth-server ericerer/auth-server && sudo docker push ericerer/auth-server
scripts.build-frontend: sudo docker build -f devops/frontend.Dockerfile -t frontend . && sudo docker tag frontend ericerer/frontend && sudo docker push ericerer/frontend
scripts.build-all-docker: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-gateway && npm run build-websocket && npm run build-basicgram && npm run build-user-server && npm run build-auth-server
scripts.deploy: sudo docker swarm init && sudo docker-compose -f devops/docker-compose.yml pull && sudo docker stack deploy -c devops/docker-compose.yml message-app
